meanings.definition: plural noun: infectious diseases caused by a virus
meanings.sent1: Viroses can spread quickly among a group of people.
meanings.sent2: Doctors are studying different viroses to find cures.

meanings.sent5: The viroses danced through the body, leaving a trail of illness in their wake.

meanings.sent3: The sneaky viroses snuck into the system undetected.
meanings.sent4: His words virosed her mind, spreading doubt and confusion.
